text: Pleun Strik (27 May 1944 â€“ 14 July 2022) was a Dutch professional footballer. He played a defender. Strik was born in Rotterdam, Netherlands. He played for the Netherlands national football team eight times between 1969 to 1974. Strik died on 14 July 2022 at the age of 78.Voormalig PSV-aanvoerder Pleun Strik overleden ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Rotterdam
